lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Hello there chief! It’s me, Willow! How has your day been?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: It has been a while since I have been here the last time, but I really needed to unwind, so I thought I will hop over!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I really liked your tea selection, you know? You could always pick out and brew me something if I just told you what notes I feel like today.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Today, I feel like getting myself sweet and very flavorful. Could you prepare something like that for me, please?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: If that helps - I remember you telling me about your special cinnamon chai. I want something similar to that. Thank you!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Uhm… Thank you for this blend. It is… certainly… interesting?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I wouldn’t want to be rude or to bash on your efforts, but that’s… kind of not what I had in mind.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Normally, I would just accept it, but I think I should really start asserting myself.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: So could you please remake the tea, please? Remember - something sweet and full of flavor. Cinnamon chai or something similar.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Sorry for troubling you!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Hehehe… Thanks a lot! That was exactly what I had in mind!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Hehe, now that is much better. Thanks for remaking that order for me!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Oh, that got me thinking…

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: What’s your favorite type of tea, by the way?

options.line: Herbal or white tea are more of my thing
I’m more of a coffee person

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Oh, I see, I see!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I heard that fans of flavored blends tend to be open-minded and creative. They are often quite playful, and like to break the rules from time to time.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Hmmm, that’s interesting…

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: From what I heard, fans of tastes like that have good attention to detail and are very goal-oriented. They like “playing the long game”, so to speak.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Oh, that’s nice!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Those kinds of tea are very delicate in flavor, so people who like them very often care about beauty, and finding enjoyment in simple things.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Oh? That’s surprising, since you’re running a tea shop and all.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But I think I get it! Coffee drinkers tend to be more daring, and also more diligent about the things they do.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Do you think that fits you?

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Hehe! Thanks for indulging my curiosity!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Hehe, that is what I heard anyway, so you can take it with a pinch of salt. But thanks for answering!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But anyway, you may wonder why I’m here all of a sudden.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I wouldn’t want to dump my personal life details on you, but I think I can trust you.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Truth be told, I broke up with my partner recently. But she wasn’t, like, bad towards me or anything. She was wonderful!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: For the most part, that is.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But I started to feel that she treats me like a baby.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: She would get very overbearing and controlling whenever I wanted to do things on my own, without involving her in everything.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: She would always ask me questions like 'are you sure you want to do this?' or 'maybe we should be doing something else instead?'

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I’m an adult, you know! I’m allowed to have my own opinions! My own ideas about what I should be doing!

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: I think there comes a time where you just have to let go and let people really be themselves.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Yeah. So that’s that.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Hope I didn’t bother you, I just had to let it out.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: Thanks for listening! I knew I could count on a sympathetic ear, at least.

lines.name: Willow
lines.line: But I really need to get going. Catch you later!
